definitions.definition: in its natural state, before it has been processed or refined

examples.text: We adjusted crude effects for age, education, height and weight.

definitions.definition: offensive or rude, especially about sex
simple and not very accurate but giving a general idea of something

examples.text: **In crude terms**, a heart attack is a plumbing problem in blood vessels around the heart.

definitions.definition: simply made, not showing much skill or attention to detail

examples.text: a crude drawing of a face

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Latin crudus ‘raw, rough’.
